018package org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.nio.file.Files.createDirectories;
022import static java.nio.file.Files.exists;
023import static java.nio.file.Files.notExists;
024import static java.nio.file.Files.readAllLines;
025import static java.nio.file.Files.writeString;
026import static java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption.CREATE;
027import static java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption.WRITE;
028import static java.util.Comparator.naturalOrder;
029import static java.util.regex.Pattern.compile;
030import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
031import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.breakText;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmpty;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
041
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.nio.file.Path;
044import java.time.Clock;
045import java.time.Instant;
046import java.util.ArrayList;
047import java.util.Collection;
048import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
049import java.util.List;
050import java.util.Map;
051import java.util.Optional;
052import java.util.StringJoiner;
053import java.util.regex.Pattern;
054import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
055import java.util.stream.Stream;
056
057import org.apiguardian.api.API;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.PathStringConverter;
063
064/**
065 *  The implementation for
066 *  {@link INIFile}.
067 *
068 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
069 *  @version $Id: INIFileImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $
070 *
071 *  @UMLGraph.link
072 *  @since 0.1.0
073 */
074@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIFileImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $" )
075@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
076public final class INIFileImpl implements INIFile
077{
078        /*------------*\
079    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
080        \*------------*/
081    /**
082     *  The clock that is used to determine the last update. This is changed
083     *  only for testing purposes, the default is
084     *  {@link Clock#systemDefaultZone()}.
085     */
086    private Clock m_Clock = Clock.systemDefaultZone();
087
088    /**
089     *  The comment for this file.
090     */
091    @SuppressWarnings( "StringBufferField" )
092    private final StringBuilder m_Comment = new StringBuilder();
093
094    /**
095     *  The reference to file that is used to persist the contents.
096     */
097    private final Path m_File;
098
099    /**
100     *  The groups.
101     */
102    private final Map<String,Group> m_Groups = new LinkedHashMap<>();
103
104    /**
105     *  The time when the file was last updated.
106     */
107    private Instant m_LastUpdated;
108
109        /*------------------------*\
110    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
111        \*------------------------*/
112    /**
113     *  The format String that is used for the last updated comment.
114     */
115    private static final String LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT;
116
117    /**
118     *  The pattern that is used for the last updated comment.
119     */
120    private static final Pattern LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN;
121
122    static
123    {
124        @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
125        final var s = "# Last Update: ";
126        LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT = format( "%s%%s", s );
127
128        try
129        {
130            LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN = compile( format( "%s(.*)$", s ) );
131        }
132        catch( final PatternSyntaxException e )
133        {
134            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
135        }
136    }
137
138        /*--------------*\
139    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
140        \*--------------*/
141    /**
142     *  <p>{@summary Creates a new instance of {@code INIFileImpl}.}</p>
143     *  <p>The constructor does not check whether the <i>file</i> argument is
144     *  {@code null}; this has to be done by the factory methods
145     *  {@link #create(Path)}
146     *  and
147     *  {@link #open(Path)}.</p>
148     *  <p>But this allows simpler tests.</p>
149     *
150     *  @param  file    The file that holds the contents.
151     */
152    public INIFileImpl( final Path file )
153    {
154        m_File = file;
155        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now( m_Clock );
156    }   //  INIFileImpl()
157
158        /*---------*\
159    ====** Methods **==========================================================
160        \*---------*/
161    /**
162     * {@inheritDoc}
163     */
164    @Override
165    public final void addComment( final String comment )
166    {
167        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) ) m_Comment.append( comment );
168    }   //  addComment()
169
170    /**
171     * {@inheritDoc}
172     */
173    @Override
174    public final void addComment( final String group, final String comment )
175    {
176        requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" );
177        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) )
178        {
179            @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
180            final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
181            g.addComment( comment );
182        }
183    }   //  addComment()
184
185    /**
186     * {@inheritDoc}
187     */
188    @Override
189    public final void addComment( final String group, final String key, final String comment )
190    {
191        requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" );
192        requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" );
193        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) )
194        {
195            @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
196            final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
197            g.addComment( key, comment );
198        }
199    }   //  addComment()
200
201    /**
202     *  Breaks the given String into chunks of
203     *  {@value #LINE_LENGTH}
204     *  characters. All but the last chunk will end with a backslash
205     *  (&quot;\&quot;).
206     *
207     *  @param  s   The String to split.
208     *  @return The stream with the chunks.
209     */
210    public static final Stream<String> breakString( final String s)
211    {
212        var remainder = requireNonNullArgument( s, "s" );
213        final var builder = Stream.<String>builder();
214        while( remainder.length() > LINE_LENGTH )
215        {
216            //noinspection ConstantExpression
217            builder.add( format( "%s\\", remainder.substring( 0, LINE_LENGTH - 1 ) ) );
218            remainder = remainder.substring( LINE_LENGTH );
219        }
220        builder.add( remainder );
221
222        final var retValue = builder.build();
223
224        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
225        return retValue;
226    }   //  breakString()
227
228    /**
229     *  <p>{@summary Creates an empty INI file.} If the file already exists, it
230     *  will be overwritten without notice.</p>
231     *  <p>The given file is used to store the value on a call to
232     *  {@link #save()}.</p>
233     *
234     *  @param  file    The file.
235     *  @return The new instance.
236     */
237    public static final INIFile create( final Path file )
238    {
239        final INIFile retValue = new INIFileImpl( requireNonNullArgument( file, "file" ) );
240
241        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
242        return retValue;
243    }   //  create()
244
245    /**
246     *  Creates a new instance of
247     *  {@link Group}
248     *  for the given name.
249     *
250     *  @param  group   The name of the group.
251     *  @return The new instance.
252     */
253    private final Group createGroup( final String group )
254    {
255        return new Group( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ) );
256    }   //  createGroup()
257
258    /**
259     *  Dumps the contents to a String.
260     *
261     *  @return The contents in a String.
262     */
263    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
264    public final String dumpContents()
265    {
266        final var joiner = new StringJoiner( "\n", EMPTY_STRING, "\n" );
267        if( !m_Comment.isEmpty() )
268        {
269            splitComment( m_Comment ).forEach( joiner::add );
270        }
271        joiner.add( format( LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT, m_LastUpdated.toString() ) );
272        final var retValue = m_Groups.values()
273            .stream()
274            .map( Group::toString )
275            .collect( joining( EMPTY_STRING, joiner.toString(), EMPTY_STRING ) );
276
277        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
278        return retValue;
279    }   //  dumpContents()
280
281    /**
282     *  {@inheritDoc}
283     */
284    @Override
285    public final Optional<String> getValue( final String group, final String key )
286    {
287        Optional<String> retValue = Optional.empty();
288        if( isNotEmpty( group ) )
289        {
290            @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
291            final var g = m_Groups.get( group );
292            if( nonNull( g ) )
293            {
294                retValue = g.getValue( key )
295                    .map( Value::getValue );
296            }
297        }
298
299        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
300        return retValue;
301    }   //  getValue()
302
303    /**
304     *  {@inheritDoc}
305     */
306    @Override
307    public final <T> Optional<T> getValue( final String group, final String key, final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter )
308    {
309        requireNonNullArgument( stringConverter, "stringConverter" );
310        final Optional<T> retValue = getValue( group, key )
311            .map( stringConverter::fromString );
312
313        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
314        return retValue;
315    }   //  getValue()
316
317    /**
318     *  {@inheritDoc}
319     */
320    @Override
321    public final boolean hasGroup( final String group )
322    {
323        return isNotEmptyOrBlank( group ) && m_Groups.containsKey( group );
324    }   //  hasGroup()
325
326    /**
327     *  {@inheritDoc}
328     */
329    @Override
330    public final boolean hasValue( final String group, final String key )
331    {
332        return getValue( group, key ).isPresent();
333    }   //  hasValue()
334
335    /**
336     *  Join all lines that end with a backslash with the next line on the
337     *  list.
338     *
339     *  @param  lines   The input lines.
340     *  @return The output.
341     */
342    private final List<String> joinLines( final Iterable<String> lines )
343    {
344        final List<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
345
346        final var buffer = new StringBuilder();
347        for( final var line : lines )
348        {
349            if( line.endsWith( "\\" ) )
350            {
351                buffer.append( line );
352                buffer.setLength( buffer.length() - 1 );
353            }
354            else if( buffer.isEmpty() )
355            {
356                retValue.add( line );
357            }
358            else
359            {
360                buffer.append( line );
361                retValue.add( buffer.toString() );
362                buffer.setLength( 0 );
363            }
364        }
365        if( !buffer.isEmpty() ) retValue.add( buffer.toString() );
366
367        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
368        return retValue;
369    }   //  joinLines()
370
371    /**
372     *  {@inheritDoc}
373     */
374    @Override
375    public final Collection<Entry> listEntries()
376    {
377        final List<Entry> buffer = new ArrayList<>();
378        for( final var group : m_Groups.values() )
379        {
380            for( final var key : group.getKeys() )
381            {
382                final var value = group.getValue( key );
383                buffer.add( new Entry( group.getName(), key, value.map( Value::getValue ).orElse( null ) ) );
384            }
385        }
386        buffer.sort( naturalOrder() );
387        final var retValue = List.copyOf( buffer );
388
389        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
390        return retValue;
391    }   //  listEntries()
392
393    /**
394     *  Opens the given INI file and reads its contents. If the file does not
395     *  exist yet, a new, empty file will be created.
396     *
397     *  @param  file    The file.
398     *  @return The new instance.
399     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
400     */
401    public static final INIFile open( final Path file ) throws IOException
402    {
403        final var retValue = new INIFileImpl( requireNonNullArgument( file, "file" ) );
404        retValue.parse();
405
406        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
407        return retValue;
408    }   //  open()
409
410    /**
411     *  Loads the content from the file into memory.
412     *
413     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
414     */
415    private final void parse() throws IOException
416    {
417        if( exists( m_File ) )
418        {
419            final var lines = joinLines( readAllLines( m_File, UTF8 ) );
420            parse( lines );
421        }
422    }   //  parse()
423
424    /**
425     *  Parses the given lines to the INI file contents.
426     *
427     *  @param  lines   The joined lines; the list does not contain any
428     *      multi-line constructs.
429     *  @throws IOException The structure is invalid.
430     */
431    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
432    public final void parse( final List<String> lines ) throws IOException
433    {
434        Group currentGroup = null;
435        final Collection<String> commentBuffer = new ArrayList<>();
436        m_Comment.setLength( 0 );
437        var commentsToBuffer = false;
438
439        final var errorMessage = Lazy.use( () -> "'%s' has invalid structure".formatted( PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( m_File ) ) );
440
441        final var groupPattern = compile( "\\[(.*)]" );
442        ScanLoop: for( final var line : requireNonNullArgument( lines, "lines" ) )
443        {
444            var matcher = LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN.matcher( line );
445            if( matcher.matches() )
446            {
447                m_LastUpdated = Instant.parse( matcher.group( 1 ) );
448                continue ScanLoop;
449            }
450
451            if( line.startsWith( "#" ) )
452            {
453                //---* Comment line found *------------------------------------
454                @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
455                final var s = (line.length() > 1 ? line.substring( 1 ).trim() : EMPTY_STRING);
456                if( commentsToBuffer )
457                {
458                    commentBuffer.add( s );
459                }
460                else
461                {
462                    m_Comment.append( s );
463                }
464                continue ScanLoop;
465            }
466
467            matcher = groupPattern.matcher( line );
468            if( matcher.matches() )
469            {
470                final var name = matcher.group( 1 );
471                currentGroup = createGroup( name );
472                m_Groups.put( name, currentGroup );
473                commentBuffer.forEach( currentGroup::addComment );
474                commentBuffer.clear();
475                continue ScanLoop;
476            }
477
478            if( line.isBlank() )
479            {
480                commentsToBuffer = true;
481                continue ScanLoop;
482            }
483
484            if( isNull( currentGroup) ) throw new IOException( errorMessage.get() );
485            final var pos = line.indexOf( '=' );
486            if( pos < 1 ) throw new IOException( errorMessage.get() );
487            final var key = line.substring( 0, pos ).trim();
488            final var data = line.length() > pos ? line.substring( pos + 1 ).trim() : EMPTY_STRING;
489            final var value = currentGroup.setValue( key, data );
490            commentBuffer.forEach( value::addComment );
491            commentBuffer.clear();
492        }   //  ScanLoop:
493    }   //  parse()
494
495    /**
496     *  {@inheritDoc}
497     */
498    @Override
499    public final void refresh() throws IOException { parse(); }
500
501    /**
502     *  Saves the contents of the INI file to the file that was provided to
503     *  {@link #create(Path)}
504     *  or
505     *  {@link #open(Path)}.
506     *
507     *  @throws IOException  A problem occurred when writing the contents to
508     *      the file.
509     */
510    @Override
511    public final void save() throws IOException
512    {
513        if( notExists( m_File ) )
514        {
515            final var folder = m_File.getParent();
516            if( notExists( folder ) ) createDirectories( folder );
517        }
518        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now( m_Clock );
519        writeString( m_File, dumpContents(), UTF8, CREATE, WRITE );
520    }   //  save()
521
522    /**
523     *  <p>{@summary Sets the clock that is used to determine the last
524     *  update.}</p>
525     *  <p>This is used only for testing purposes.</p>
526     *
527     *  @param  clock   The clock.
528     */
529    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
530    public final void setClock( final Clock clock )
531    {
532        m_Clock = requireNonNullArgument( clock, "clock" );
533        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now( clock );
534    }   //  setClock()
535
536    /**
537     *  {@inheritDoc}
538     */
539    @Override
540    public final void setValue( final String group, final String key, final String value )
541    {
542        @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
543        final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
544        g.setValue( key, value );
545    }   //  setValue()
546
547    /**
548     *  Splits a comment to the proper line length.
549     *
550     *  @param  comment The comment to split.
551     *  @return The lines for the comment.
552     */
553    public static final Collection<String> splitComment( final CharSequence comment )
554    {
555        final Collection<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
556
557        if( !requireNonNullArgument( comment, "comment" ).isEmpty() )
558        {
559            //noinspection ConstantExpression
560            breakText( comment, LINE_LENGTH - 2 )
561                .map( "# "::concat )
562                .map( String::trim )
563                .forEach( retValue::add );
564        }
565
566        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
567        return retValue;
568    }   //  splitComment()
569
570    /**
571     *  {@inheritDoc}
572     */
573    @Override
574    public final String toString() { return dumpContents(); }
575}
576//  class INIFileImpl
577
578/*
579 *  End of File
